name: FromZeroToHero
description:
From Zero to Hero

This is my entry for the LD38.

You are Zer0, asmall particle wandering in the space when a voice calls you...

Movement: WASD

Shield: LClick.

I made it in 14H, thanks for playing and hope you like it!
